This sale begins at midnight 3/19/22 in the time zone in which you live.  It ends 24 hours later at midnight 3/20/22.  If you choose to purchase a card within 1 minute of the vernal equinox in your time zone, the asking price will be significantly discounted.  The beginning and end of the auction and the timing of the discount will vary depending on your location.  Shipping is free.  Payments are net to me.  Once again PP F&F is accepted as long as you do not reference a purchase, an address or any other mention that would suggest a sale.  You give me the money and I will give you the card in return.  Checks and money orders are also welcome.  Here are the offerings:


Pat McCauley - PSA 2 - OMSL - $280

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10471/mccauley-omsl[/IMG]

John McGraw HOF - Glove at Hip - SGC 4 - Polar Bear - $444

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/31477/mcgraw-glove-at-hip-pb[/IMG]

George Merritt - PSA 5 - P350 - $300

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/57852/merritt[/IMG]

Ambrose Puttman - PSA 5 - P350 - $275

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10556/puttman[/IMG]

George Perring - SGC 5.5 - P350 - $240

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/17717/perring[/IMG]

Please respond via PM with your method of payment and mailing address which will be used for time zone verification.  

The total amount allotted for the discount will be shared by up to five winners equally.

The decision of the judge (me) is final.  Hope to hear from you tomorrow.

The Vernal Equinox has passed at 33 minutes after this hour regardless of time zone.

The total asking price of the five cards is $1539.

The discount pool was 10% of of $1539 or $154.

If five people had responded their discount would have been 10% of the asking price.

But if only one person had responded in the 3 minute window, he would have received a discount of $154 regardless of the card chosen.

The cards remain available until midnight Sunday wherever you are, but the discount opportunity has expired.

Enjoy your spring.

Frank, didn't Vernal Equinox play with Philly?  Always thought he was an underated player.

Great cards and fun discount idea, glws.
